ygData.subject: Re: Trivial Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Where did you find the file molds?  I have been looking everywhere for them. I found skewer molds but no file molds. ... From: Robert Tortajada
ygData.messageBody:
Where did you find the file molds? I have been looking everywhere for them.
I found skewer molds but no file molds.


----Original Message Follows----
From: Robert Tortajada <bobt@...>
Reply-To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Trivial Levels
Date: Thu, 07 Oct 1999 18:49:54 -0400

Someone told me to make scalars (files) from skill level 20 to 40. So I ran
and
bout all the file molds I could carry only to find that they were trivial to
me. I
had to sell all the molds back to the NPC and make studs. This brings up the
question, is there a list of objects and their trivial level? Also, what is
the
best thing to make at 23? I think my choices are:

Skewers
studs
lanterns

Any suggestions?

I would think that studs might be good if they can be sold to players, but I
would
have no idea what studs would sell for.

Cerivolk - karana
